首里城火災のスマホ動画拡散、那覇市消防局の職員が撮影

07 Nov 2019, 00:03

　那覇市の首里城が炎上する様子を正殿前の広場から撮影したとみられる動画がＳＮＳ上で拡散されており、那覇市消防局は６日、調査の結果、撮影者は同局の職員だったと明らかにした。業務として現場の様子を記録するために撮影したが、外部に流出した経緯は不明という。
　発表によると、職員は１０月３１日午前４時頃、スマートフォンで動画を１７秒間撮影し、ＬＩＮＥで同局の管理職約１５人に送信した。管理職を通じて動画を共有した職員もおり、少なくとも約３５人が受け取っていた。全員が流出への関与を否定しており、同局は引き続き経緯を調べる。

Smart phone video of Shuri Castle Fire, taken by Naha City Fire Bureau staff

07 Nov 2019, 00:03

A video that seems to have been taken from the square in front of the main shrine in the state of Shuri Castle in Naha City is spreading on the SNS, the Naha City Fire Bureau on the 6th, as a result of the investigation, the photographer was the staff of the same station Revealed. I took a picture to record the situation at work as a business, but it is unclear how it leaked outside.
According to the announcement, the staff took a video for 17 seconds on October 31 at 4am and sent it to about 15 managers of the same station on LINE. Some staff shared videos through managerial positions, and at least about 35 people received it. All have denied involvement in the spill, and the department will continue to examine the process.
